name: places/ChIJwwflK79ZwokRkFDJVLwBV8Q
formattedAddress: 307 W 79th St, New York, NY 10024, USA
adrFormatAddress: 307 W 79th St, New York, NY 10024, USA

originalText.text:
We are so glad we found Joe! After we scheduled a first meeting, he came by the house to meet us and our two cats. He was very nice and polite and took notes about their food schedules and preferences. While we were away, he came for a whole week twice a day to feed them and clean their litter box but also gave them attention and played with them. Joe sent updates every day with texts and photos. It was a relief knowing our cats were safe, fed and most importantly, had good company.
We were very pleased with his work, our cats were happy and calm when we returned.
By the way, we were very impressed with the pictures he sent, he happens to be a talented pet photographer! Overall, an excellent job.

text.text:
We are so glad we found Joe! After we scheduled a first meeting, he came by the house to meet us and our two cats. He was very nice and polite and took notes about their food schedules and preferences. While we were away, he came for a whole week twice a day to feed them and clean their litter box but also gave them attention and played with them. Joe sent updates every day with texts and photos. originalText.text: Joe went above and beyond in his taking care of our two cats while we were away! Our situation was too complicated to detail here, but the circumstances of our time away from our cats changes drastically last minute and Joe swooped in to save the day, agreeing to feed our cats a day early and was similarly flexible when it turned out we would be returning sooner than expected. He was more than happy to follow our bespoke feeding and medication instructions for each cat and even helped out with sourcing places nearby that might have our cat's prescription when it turned out we were running low on remaining doses. We loved receiving daily updates and photos of our beloved cats while away, and it was such a relief knowing our cats were being well cared for by Joe in our absence. Communication was a breeze, as was our introductory visit and key exchange before we left. Oh, and Joe even brought up some packages that had come for us at our building's front desk while we were away, which we hadn't expected at all, but it was so nice to come home to! Definitely recommend Joe for your catsitting needs.

originalText.text: I highly recommend Joe Daly.  He gives great care to our two  cats when we are out of town.  He keeps me informed twice a day with pictures of them which always eases my mind and you can tell he is a genuine “cat person.” He even ran to pick up cat litter for me once when we we were running low while out of town and the Amazon delivery was delayed.

originalText.text:
June 2023 - This is the 4th time that Joe has taken care of my cat, Logan while I was away, and once again I returned home to a very happy and healthy pet! Joe is just the best, incredibly reliable, caring, and gifted with animals!  Jessica B.

Winter, 2023 - Joe has taken care of my cat for over a year now and is superb as a   cat sitter!  He is utterly dependable, truly loves cats and knows how to care for them, and always makes the extra effort to provide impeccable service, I fully recommend him!
